<JD_START>
Job Title: Accounts Payable Specialist

Location: San Antonio, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting? Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Community focused non profit seeks Accounts Payable Specialist in San Antonio, TX to startt Monday 4/22/24!!!

This Jobot Consulting Job is hosted by Scott Steele

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $20 - $23.5 per hour

A Bit About Us

Non-profit, Community focused health care organization



Why join us?


Great work environment

Oustanding Health Care Benefits available through Blue Cross/Blue Shield

Vision Insurance

Dental Insurance

401k

Job Details

Job Details

We are currently seeking a dynamic, detail-oriented Consulting Accounts Payable Specialist to join our highly esteemed Finance team. This role will provide you with an exciting opportunity to showcase your exceptional skills in managing accounts payable and financial auditing. You will be part of a collaborative team that values your insight, encourages your innovative thinking, and appreciates your dedication to financial accuracy. This role is perfect for those who enjoy challenges, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and have a passion for numbers and financial data.

Responsibilities

As a Consulting Accounts Payable Specialist, you will be responsible for

 Managing and processing all aspects of accounts payable, including 1099, invoicing, invoices, expense reports, and check requests. Executing 3 way match for invoices to ensure accuracy and completeness. Performing data entry tasks with high precision and speed. Processing wire transfers and handling other forms of payments. Assisting in the preparation of financial audits, ensuring all financial documents and reports are accurate and ready for review. Collaborating with the finance team to develop and implement financial strategies. Analyzing financial data and creating reports to assist in decision making. Identifying and resolving any discrepancies in financial reports and documents. Ensuring compliance with all financial regulations and company policies.

Qualifications

To be considered for this exciting role, you should have

 A minimum of 5 years of experience in an accounts payable role or similar. Proficiency in managing 1099, invoicing, invoices, expense reports, and check requests. Experience in 3 way match and data entry. Knowledge of wire transfers and other payment methods. A strong background in financial audit prep and execution. Excellent numerical skills and attention to detail. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make decisions based on accurate and timely analysis. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. The ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficiency in using financial software and Microsoft Office Suite. A Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field is preferred.

This is an incredible opportunity for a seasoned accounts payable specialist to take their career to the next level. If you have the skills, experience and drive to excel in this role, we would love to hear from you. Apply today!

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting?

Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
